segments.text: Hello . Could I speak to Justin , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , hi Justin . This is Karen Hepburn.We met at Chris and Jim's party .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . Uh , Justin , would you like to see Otis Lesley on Thursday night ? He's at the Kangaroo Club .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , Karen , but I can't . I have to work late this Thursday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , are you doing anything on Friday or Saturday ? He's playing those two nights as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I can't make it on Friday either , but I'm free on Saturday night . What time does it start ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At eight sharp.How about meeting in front of the club at about a quarter after seven ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds perfect.And let's go out for coffee after the show .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: See you at seven fifteen , Saturday .
segments.speaker: S2
